Good job! You are using the Tor Browser: Hyvä homma! Käytät Tor-selainta, joka antaa sinulle lisäyksityisyyttä ja turvallisuutta kun selaat internettiä.

Please do not forward or share this e-ma: Please do not forward or share this e-mail: each tip-off allows a limited number of accesses and downloads before being destroyed forever and nobody (even the node administrator) can recover an expired or dead tip-off.
Please never disclose these files until: Please never disclose these files until an appropriate analysis, fact checking, journalistic and technical redaction process. Receivers are very important for a Globa: Receivers are very important for a GlobaLeaks based initiative. They are the people responsible for receiving the whistleblowers' submissions, verifying their authenticity and taking action upon them. Choose them wisely.

Since GlobaLeaks users are all anonymous: Koska GlobaLeaks-käyttäjät ovat kaikki nimettömiä, ei ole mahdollista suorittaa poikkeavuushavannointia käyttäjäkäytäntöihin perustuen.

There are %EventCount% good reasons to c: There are %EventCount% good reasons to connect exactly where you know!
There are three types of users inside of: There are three types of users inside of GlobaLeaks: the administrator, the receivers and the whistleblower. Your username for accessing the node as the administrator will be 'admin'.
These are the thresholds that are used t: Nämä ovat kynnysarvot, joita käytetään tunnistamaan poikkeava käyttäytyminen:
They would like you to pay special atten: They would like you to pay special attention to the information and material contained therein. Please keep in mind that whistleblowers often expose themselves to high personal risks for the public interest. Therefore the material that they provide with this tip-off should be considered of high importance.
This could be the sign of an attack or j: This could be the sign of an attack or just a spike in usage due to the increased visibility of your initiative.
This email will be used for ping notific: This email will be used for ping notifications.
This happens whenever encryption is unav: Tätä tapahtuu silloin kun salausta ei ole saatavilla.
This interface may help you spot anomali: Tämä käyttöliittymä voi auttaa paljastamaan poikkeavuuden solmussasi.
This interface may help you understand h: Tämä käyttöliittymä auttaa sinua ymmärtämään, kuinka solmu voidaan asettaa ja tarjoaa joitakin tietoja siitä kuinka otat yhteyttä muihin GlobaLeaks-käyttäjiin ja asiantuntijoihin.

Tämä käyttöliittymä voi auttaa sinua ymmärtämään, kuinka ilmiantaja käyttää solmua. Se näyttää lähetykset, jotka ovat parhaillaan solmussa ja muutamia tilastoja käyttötyypistä (aktiviteetti, tiedostot, kommentit).
This interface permits to configure the: Tämä käyttöliittymä sallii asettaa sähköpostimallit, joita käytetään turvallisiin sähköposti-ilmoituksiin.
Tämä käyttöliittymä sallii asettaa sähköpostimallit, joita käytetään turvattomiin sähköposti-ilmoituksiin.
This interface shows the activity of the: Tämä käyttöliittymä näyttää solmusi käyttäjien aktiviteetin. Tämä voi olla hyödyllinen poikkeavuuksien havaitsemiseen ja solmusi vastaanottajien tukemiseen.
This interface shows you the unusual beh: Tämä käyttöliittymä näyttää järjestelmän tunnistaman epätavallisen käyttäytymisen.
This is a work-in-progress of the admini: Tämä on ylläpitokäyttöliittymän aihio, jonka näet sen jälkeen, kun kirjaudut alustallasi ylläpitäjänä.

Tämä sähköposti-ilmoitus ilmoittaa, että ilmiantaja on valinnut sinut arvokkaana vastaanottajana hänen lähetyksilleen.
This is an e-mail notification to notify you that a whistleblower has updated a submission with new material.

This is an e-mail to inform you that your PGP key will expire on %PGPExpirationDate%

This may lead to unintended access to th: This may lead to unintended access to the files by the server administrator or others in case the server is compromised.
This means that the submitted files will: Tämä tarkoittaa, että lähetetyt tiedostot tallennetaan tavallisena tekstinä solmuusi.
This platform makes use of GlobaLeaks so: This platform makes use of GlobaLeaks software specifically designed to protect the identity of the submitter and of the receiver in the exchange of leaked materials.

To ensure your anonymity be sure that yo:
To ensure your anonymity be sure that you are visiting this site using the Tor Browser Bundle.
You acknowledge that failure to do so will result in the inability to technically protect your anonymity.
To further enhance your security, please follow these instructions:
1) In the event that you would like to remain anonymous, do not submit any personal information. (e.g. your name or relationship to the offender. Do not submit any information that can be traced back to you.)
2) Please do not submit your report on a PC provided by your employer. Particularly an intranet connection may jeopardize your anonymity.

Which of the following statements is tru: Which of the following statements is true?
Whistleblowers can perform submissions v: Ilmiantajat voivat suorittaa ilmiantoja Tor2web-verkon kautta
With a HTTPS submission you are exposing:
With a HTTPS submission you are exposing yourself to the risks that someone else will know that you have submitted something, without knowing what you have submitted.

Instead with an Anonymous Submission you are fully protected, it is not possible for a third party to know that you have submitted something nor what you have submitted.

We strongly advise you to go for an Anonymous Submission.

To make an Anonymous Submission, instead of using your usual Web Browser (Internet Explorer, Chrome, Firefox, Opera, etc.) you should use the Tor Browser Bundle. This is a special piece of software designed to enable Anonymous Web Browsing.
Without a valid PGP key, the system will: Without a valid PGP key, the system will not be able to send you encrypted notifications.
You are aware of the risks involved. Go: You are aware of the risks involved. Go ahead, but consider yourself warned.
You are connecting to the node without a: Olet yhdistänyt solmun ilman nimettömyyttä ja tämä solmu tukee vain nimettömiä lähetyksiä
You are receiving this email because you: You are receiving this email because you should look into this to determine if the cause is malicious or not.
You are strongly advised to visit this s: You are strongly advised to visit this site using the desktop app called Tor Browser, that protects your identity.
You are strongly suggested to use the To: You are strongly suggested to use the Tor Browser, unless you know what you are doing.

You have finished configuring your Globa: You have finished configuring your GlobaLeaks site. You are now ready to future tweak it inside of the admin interface.
You have not configured your encryption: You have not configured your encryption keys, so the files will be stored on the GlobaLeaks node un-encrypted.
You should extend its validity and updat: You should extend its validity and update the key present on the GlobaLeaks nodes you are subscribed to or upload a new key.
